languages.text: "Игр, говорите? Что ж, игры — действительно напрасная трата времени". {n}В голосе Хейнрикса сквозит горечь, но его выражение не меняется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Игр, говорите? Что ж, игры — действительно напрасная трата времени". {n}В голосе Хейнрикса сквозит горечь, но его выражение не меняется.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Игр, говорите? Что ж, игры — действительно напрасная трата времени". {n}В голосе Хейнрикса сквозит горечь, но его выражение не меняется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Juegos, dices? Bien, en ese caso estoy totalmente de acuerdo; los juegos me parecen una pérdida de tiempo». {n}La voz de Heinrix revela un poso de amargura, pero su expresión permanece inalterable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Juegos, dices? Bien, en ese caso estoy totalmente de acuerdo; los juegos me parecen una pérdida de tiempo». {n}La voz de Heinrix revela un poso de amargura, pero su expresión permanece inalterable.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「お遊びだと？ 遊びは確かに時間の無駄だな。終わりにしよう」{n}ハインリックスの声から苦々しさが垣間見えるが、彼の表情は変わらない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お遊びだと？ 遊びは確かに時間の無駄だな。終わりにしよう」{n}ハインリックスの声から苦々しさが垣間見えるが、彼の表情は変わらない。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你是说，这场游戏？既然如此，我完全同意，这场游戏确实是在浪费时间。”{n}海因里希的声音带着苦涩，但他的表情并没有变。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你是说，这场游戏？既然如此，我完全同意，这场游戏确实是在浪费时间。”{n}海因里希的声音带着苦涩，但他的表情并没有变。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Des jeux, dites-vous ? Dans ce cas, je suis tout à fait d'accord avec vous. Les jeux sont une perte de temps. » {n}La voix d'Heinrix est teintée d'amertume, mais son expression ne change pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Des jeux, dites-vous ? Dans ce cas, je suis tout à fait d'accord avec vous. Les jeux sont une perte de temps. » {n}La voix d'Heinrix est teintée d'amertume, mais son expression ne change pas.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Spiele, sagt Ihr? Nun, dann stimme ich völlig zu: Spiele sind wirklich Zeitverschwendung." {n}Heinrix' Stimme ist durchzogen von Verbitterung, doch sein Ausdruck ändert sich nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Spiele, sagt Ihr? Nun, dann stimme ich völlig zu: Spiele sind wirklich Zeitverschwendung." {n}Heinrix' Stimme ist durchzogen von Verbitterung, doch sein Ausdruck ändert sich nicht.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}

languages.text: "Oyun demek... Pekâlâ, tamamen katılıyorum. Oyun dediğin, külliyen vakit kaybıdır." {n}Heinrix'in sesi biraz hüzünlü çıksa da yüz ifadesi değişmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Games, you say? Well, then, I totally agree — games truly are a waste of time." {n}Heinrix's voice is tinged with bitterness, but his expression does not change.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oyun demek.. Pekâlâ, tamamen katılıyorum. Oyun dediğin, külliyen vakit kaybıdır." {n}Heinrix'in sesi biraz hüzünlü çıkıyor ama yüz ifadesi değişmiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
